modName: 1st Person fix for Standalone Witcher 3 Female Armor Retextures
summary: Fixes the first person to show the correct textures on the Standalone Witcher 3 Female Armor Retextures by zzjay and Undeadgoblin. You need the meshes and textures from the original file. This is just an esp.
descriptionHtml:
1st Person fix for Standalone Witcher 3 Female Armor Retextures
Author: zzjay & Undeadgoblin
Version: 1.0
Initial Release Date: December 1, 2015
Category: Armor


Just a quick fix for the 1st person for the Witcher 3 Triss & Yennefer armor retextures by Undeadgoblin[b]. [/b]This is just an esp, you still need the meshes and textures from Undeadgoblin's lovely retexture mod. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Skyrim
Update
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69047/?]The original Witcher 3 retexture mod[/url] by Undeadgoblin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body[/url] by Dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007/?]Suggested Original: Triss & Yennefer armor[/url] by zzjay 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1) Download Standalone Witcher 3 Female Armor Retextures by zzjay and Undeadgoblin
2) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into a temporary folder
3) Cut & Paste files to your Data folder
4) download this mod and extract/cp/overwrite when asked
5) Turn on the mod and go behind the Battleborn's house in Whiterun to find the chest
6) Have fun

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69047/?]The original Witcher 3 retexture mod[/url] by Undeadgoblin. Thanks for giving me permission to upload a fix
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body[/url] by Dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007/?]Triss & Yennefer armor[/url] by zzjay. Thanks for allowing the modding community to use your ports
author: zzjay and Undeadgoblin
